response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be equally beneficial for you. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $1,300,000. This is a generous offer considering its worth to both parties and we hope it aligns with your expectations. We look forward to discussing the details further and making this transaction a mutually beneficial experience.", "product_price": 1300000}
